General.Name: Nordon Indústrias Metalúrgicas S/A
General.Description: Nordon Indústrias Metalúrgicas S/A engages in the production of capital goods for chemical, petrochemical, cryogenic, and food and beverage sectors in Brazil. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Curitiba, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Comendador Araújo, 143, Curitiba, PR, Brazil, 80420-000
